item.title: Everyone thinks AI is replacing factory workers, but Amazon’s layoffs show it’s coming for middle management first
item.description: As Amazon slashes 14,000 white-collar roles and the U.S. approaches a million job cuts this year, AI’s first major labor casualty might be emerging.

item.title: The Hollywood blueprint holds the key to reshaping organizations in the age of AI
item.description: The Hollywood model of work is a refreshing alternative to the rigid structures of the industrial era.
